text: Naked lady or naked ladies may refer to several plants: * Amaryllis, the only genus in the subtribe Amaryllidinae * Colchicum autumnale, an autumn-blooming flowering plant * Dyckia 'Naked Lady', a bromeliad cultivar * Euphorbia tirucalli, a tree that grows in semi-arid tropical climate * Lycoris squamigera, a plant in the amaryllis family ==See also== * Naked Lady (disambiguation)
title: Naked lady
